scripts.test:dev: npx cross-env ENV=dev npx playwright test
scripts.test:qa: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test
scripts.test:stage: npx cross-env ENV=stage npx playwright test
scripts.test:qa:login: npx dotenvx run --env ENV=qa -- npx playwright test ./loginpage.spec.ts
scripts.test:qa:smoke: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep '@smoke'
scripts.test:qa:regression: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep '@regression'
scripts.test:qa:registration: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep '@registration'
scripts.test:qa:allure: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test ./loginpage.spec.ts && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
